title: Duplicated samples.
message: Your samples file has duplicated entries, this is not allowed, please correct.

checks: Check that genes are not converted to dates in Excel
Description: Check that genes are not converted to dates in Excel

title: Duplicated gene names.
message: Your count or expression matrix has duplicated gene names, and they will be merged.

checks: Check duplicate column names for samples
Description: Check duplicate column names for samples

checks: Check columns that are not in the samples file
Description: Check columns that are not in the samples file

title: Rows with only zero values.
message: Your count or expression matrix has rows with all zeros. These will be removed.
Description: Check zero rows and remove them

title: Columns with only zero values.
message: Your count or expression matrix has columns with all zeros. These will be removed.
Description: Check zero columns and remove them

title: Duplicated rows in contrasts.
message: Your contrasts file has duplicated rows. This is now allowed, please correct.

checks: Check if it's a long or short contrast
Description: Check if it's a long or short contrast

checks: Check that long contrast matches samples
Description: Check that long contrast matches samples
Check that short format column name of contrast matches the cell -1 and 1 values

checks: Check that the end output files does not have 0 columns or zero rows
title: Empty matrix.
message: Your matrix is empty, with zero rows and zero columns.
Description: Check that the end output files have >1 row and >1 column in each case.

title: Inconsistent sample names and count names
message: No one of your samples names are matching the column names in the counts file.

checks: Check that rownames(samples) match long contrast rownames.
title: Inconsistent sample names and contrast names.
message: Your input files have samples names not matching the names in contrasts or counts.

checks: Check that counts have the same order as samples.
title: Order of samples in contrast file does not match sample file.
message: We will re-order your contrast columns.
Description: Check that counts have the same order as samples.

checks: Check that rownames(samples) match colnames(counts) partially
title: Some sample names not matching count names
message: Some of your samples names are matching the column names in the counts file.
